judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Weiner reported at 3 D. & C. 2d 698.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Walter W. Riehl, with him Patrick E. Derrico, and John P. Liekar, for appellants.
Thomas L. Anderson, with him George J. Modrak, and Chris Vlachos, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Vlachos v. Witherow, Appellant.
Argued October 3, 1955.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Walter W. Riehl, with him Patrick E. Derrico, and John P. Liekar, for appellants.
November 14, 1955:
Thomas L. Anderson, with him George J. Modrak, and Chris Vlachos, for appellees.
